comment.author: 48236157@N02
comment._content: Was this at Maxwell Air Force Base?

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives

comment.author: 48236157@N02
comment._content: Very likely so. Maxwell Air For Base as been the home for professional development of the Air Corps through today into the United States Air Force. My Dad attended Squadron Officers school in 1957 at Maxwell.

comment.author: 48236157@N02
comment._content: Maxwell Air Force Base was picked by the Wright Brothers as the place where they set up their first place to teach people to fly!
